title: Tony Shalhoub on The Sting
itunes:title: Tony Shalhoub on The Sting
description:
Tony Shalhoub is a legit acting legend and Chuck was lucky enough to have a great chat with him in NY about his favorite movie, The Sting. They talked about Tony's life and great career, then zeroed in on what is now the second Newman/Redford/Hill entry onto the Movie Crush roster.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
